desc: We are a small, family-run business, with many years of crafting behind us. Growing up having the influence of various crafters in the family, from card making to dressmaking. Pursuing art from school age through to A-Levels, and more recently crafting on a bigger scale for the last 10years.

layout.text: Looking for something creative & personal for you or a loved one! Pixie's Birchington is just the place you have been looking for.
